text: Sanjukta Duttahttps://www.hindustantimes.com/lifestyle/fashion/new-york- fashion-week-2022-sanjukta-dutta-flaunts-assamese-couture-in- alphool-101644904552547.html is an Indian fashion designer.https://www.hindustantimes.com/fashion-and-trends/lmifw-ss-20-yami- gautam-sharmila-tagore-soha-ali-khan-turn-showstoppers-for-designers/story- csMlANkbHEUVDIBVtpYrwK.html Her work integrates traditional Assamese textiles and motifs with contemporary fashion elements, highlighting the cultural heritage of Assam on national and international platforms. == Early life and education == Sanjukta Dutta was born in Nagaon, Assam, India. She pursued her education in engineering and graduated with a Bachelor of Engineering (BE) degree from Assam Engineering College. After completing her studies, she began working as an Assistant Engineer in the Public Works Department (PWD). == Career == Dutta's interest in fashion and her desire to promote Assamese culture led her to start a weaving unit in Guwahati in January 2012. Subsequently, she resigned from her job in the engineering field to focus on her career as a fashion designer. She established her own fashion label, Sanjukta Studio, which is known for its fusion of Assamese traditional weaves with modern fashion trends Her designs have been showcased at various international fashion shows, and she has worked to represent Assamese culture through her garments, which often feature traditional motifs and weaving techniques from the region. == Awards and recognition == * Debut on the red carpet at the 77th Cannes Film Festival. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:Fashion designers Category:People from Assam Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sanjukta Dutta
